ee.ria.dhx.util

Class FileUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • ee.ria.dhx.util.FileUtil

  • public class FileUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods related to files. e.g. creating files, reading files, zipping and unzipping, base64 endocding and decoding
    Author:
    Aleksei Kokarev
